Class RelationUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.relation.RelationUtil

extends java.lang.Object

    0.5.5

    Erich Schubert

      • relationAsMatrix

        public static double[][] relationAsMatrix(Relation<? extends NumberVector> relation,
                                          ArrayDBIDs ids)
        Copy a relation into a double matrix.

        This is not recommended unless you need to modify the data temporarily.

        Parameters:
        relation - Relation
        ids - IDs, with well-defined order (i.e. array)
        Returns:
        Data matrix
